description: Stretch one of your arms with the palm of your hand facing the front and pull the fingers upwards for 10 seconds.
Stretch your arm agains't your chest e pull it with the other arm for 10 seconds, for each arm.
Pull your neck with the help of your hand from the left to the right, staying in that position for a few seconds.
Place your hands in the back of your head and push downwards, stretching the back of that region.
Cross your legs and go down with your hands stretched to the floor. Repeat this movement with the other leg in the front.
Seated, open your legs and and try to put both of your palms in the floor, repeat it 3 times for about 5 seconds.
Pull your knee into your chest and hold it, switch your leg after 10 seconds.
Seated, cross one leg and tilt your body to the front, switch your leg after 10 seconds.
Seated, close your eyes and cover them with the palm of your hands for 2 minutes, then open them normally.
In a open environment, look as far as you can in for directions for 3 seconds, move just your eyes. Repeat it 3 times.
Using your thumbs, massage the area below your eyebrows in circular movements for 15 seconds.
Standing up, spin your waist as much as you can to the left, hold it for 5 seconds. Then repeat it to the right.
